subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The N.H.L. Players’ Association is under the spotlight again after two ugly episodes involving James Neal of the Pittsburgh Penguins and Shawn Thornton of the Boston Bruins.
snippet: The N.H.L. Players’ Association is under the spotlight again after two ugly episodes involving James Neal of the Pittsburgh Penguins and Shawn Thornton of the Boston Bruins.
